project_name.justification: The text refers to the project as 'the Palmer VMS Project ('Palmer' or the 'Project')'.

company_name.justification: The acquiring company is identified as 'American Pacific Mining Corp. (CSE: USGD) (FSE: 1QC) (OTCQX: USGDF) ('American Pacific' or the 'Company')'.

ceo_buyer.justification: The CEO of the buyer is identified in the text: 'Warwick Smith, American Pacific's Chief Executive Officer stated:' and 'On behalf of the American Pacific Mining Corp Board of Directors: Warwick Smith, CEO & Director'.

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The transaction results in American Pacific consolidating full ownership, as stated: 'Following the acquisition of the Dowa Interest, American Pacific will have consolidated a 100%-interest in the Project'.

primary_commodity.justification: The project is described as 'an advanced stage copper-zinc-gold-silver exploration project'. Copper (Cu) is listed first, consistent with the authoritative metadata.

verified_article_link.justification: The article is about the Palmer project. The source link is provided at the end of the first document: 'To view the source version of this press release, please visit https://www.newsfilecorp.com/release/230311'.

currency.justification: The currency is explicitly stated as US dollars in the transaction terms: 'Dowa will pay US$10,000,000 to American Pacific'.

cash_payments_raw.justification: The transaction involves a payment from the seller (Dowa) to the buyer (American Pacific), not a payment from the buyer. The text states: 'Dowa has paid American Pacific USD$10,000,000'. As the buyer did not make a cash payment, this field is null.

share_payments_raw.justification: The transaction terms do not mention any payment in shares.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: The transaction terms do not mention a combined cash and share payment.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: The transaction terms do not mention any issuance of shares as consideration.

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: The transaction terms do not mention any payment in share warrants.

option_payments_raw.justification: The transaction terms do not mention any payment in options.

issued_share_price.justification: No shares were issued as part of the transaction, so there is no issued share price.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: The transaction terms do not include an exploration commitment measured in meters.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The transaction terms do not include a monetary exploration commitment.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: The transaction terms do not mention the acquisition or retention of a Net Smelter Royalty (NSR).

coverage_area_raw.justification: The text mentions 'more than 15 kilometres of favourable mineral trends', which is a length, not an area. No specific area in units like hectares or km2 is provided for the project.

coverage_area_unit.justification: No coverage area value was found in the text.

resource_size.justification: The text states that the project has 'NI-43-101 mineral resources defined at the Palmer and AG Deposits' and 'an established mineral resource', but it does not provide any specific quantities (e.g., tonnes, ounces, pounds).

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The buyer's ticker and exchange are explicitly mentioned in the first line of the press release: 'American Pacific Mining Corp. (CSE: USGD)'.
